page.title: 04Southend:The Golden Mile 2
page.content:
A survey was made of how the children of one school spent their time on the{seafront:
{year| 1st 2nd 3rd 4th total children: 34 71 34 40 on beach : 29 55 28 35 swimming : 33 63 33 37 with family : 19 57 26 32 Playground : 28 46 22 32 visit arcades : 21 28 26 30
Those children who went on the {beach}were asked how they spent their time: % 10 20 30 40 50 catch crabs :|____ 14% swimming :|____________________ 48% play games :|__ 7% sun bathe :|___________ 29% sand castles:|_ 1% collect :|_ 1% shells
